name: Car Go Vroom 2: Unprecedented Chaos
description:
Car Go Vroom has returned, this time with three times the chaos as before! Explore the desert, get teleported to a very strange FPS game, explore the mysteries of the bathroom, play with a "friend", and more! Featuring three different modes, including Story Mode, Infinity Drive, and Survival Arena, Car Go Vroom 2 is sure to engage you once again in the mayhem of the Car Go Vroom franchise!

CONTROLS

Left: Drive left

Right: Drive right

Space: Jump

Shift-Left: Rotate right

Shift-Right: Rotate left

A: P2 Left

D: P2 Right
